title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if finds f'(x) and g'(x) explicitly

1 point is earned for setting student's f'(x) equal to student's g'(x) explicitly

1 point is earned for setting f(x)=g(x)

1 point is earned for solving for x and k

  f ' ( x ) = − e − x ; g ' ( x ) = K − e − x = k ← + 2 e − x = k x x = 1   a n d  k= ( − e ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaaqaaaaa aaaaWdbiaabccapaGaamOzamaaCaaaleqabaGaai4jaaaakmaabmaa baGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iabgkHiTiaadwgadaahaa WcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaadIhaaaGccaGG7aGaam4zamaaCaaaleqabaGa ai4jaaaakmaabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaadU eacqGHsislcaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaWG4baaaOGaeyyp a0Jaam4AaiabgcziSkabgUcaRiaaikdaaeaacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabe aacqGHsislcaWG4baaaOGaeyypa0Jaam4AaiaadIhaaeaacaWG4bGa eyypa0JaaGymaiaabccacaWGHbGaamOBaiaadsgacaqGGaGaae4Aai aab2dadaqadaqaaiabgkHiTiaadwgaaiaawIcacaGLPaaaaaaa@6251@
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned if finds f'(x) and g'(x) explicitly

1 point is earned for setting student's f'(x) equal to student's g'(x) explicitly

1 point is earned for setting f(x)=g(x)

1 point is earned for solving for x and k
